20101224153847.000|20101224153848.000|CC1|DEVELOPS RESISTANCE.            
20101224153848.000|20101224153850.000|CC1|>> WE'LL BE ABLE TO FOLLOW THE  
20101224153850.000|20101224153852.000|CC1|PATIENTS FOR SEVERAL MONTHS AND
